EmailTemplate.name: Exceeded Thesis Submission Dates - Faculty
EmailTemplate.subject: Exceeded Thesis Submission Dates - Faculty
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear (Faculty Manager's Name),
Please see attached list of students who have not submitted their thesis and have therefore exceeded their thesis submission date.
Can you please notify us of any extenuating circumstances as to why the student should not be Discontinued in Good Standing by (one week from date of sending). If we do not hear back from you, we will proceeded in processing the discontinuation.
Many thanks,
{!User.FirstName}
Graduate Research Services _____________________________________________ Monash Graduate Education Chancellery Building D, 26 Sports Walk Monash University, VIC 3800, Australia Phone: +61 3 990 53009 | Fax: +61 3 990 55042 Email: mge-candidature@monash.edu Website: monash.edu/graduate-research Campus Map: monash.edu/campuses/clayton/ CRICOS Provider No. 00008C
